ygData.subject: Re: Unfair advantage...
ygData.msgSnippet: No doubt JM, do it all the time.  It really helps when making a fur run and you re at 103/75! Kitasi of E ci ... From: J.M. Capozzi [mailto:croak63@gte.net]
ygData.messageBody:
No doubt JM, do it all the time. It really helps when making a fur run and
you're at 103/75!

Kitasi of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: J.M. Capozzi [mailto:croak63@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 1:12 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Unfair advantage...


From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>

Just a hint...you can juggle Selos and Chant of Battle quite nicely, if
you're running heavy.


----- Original Message -----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 2:10 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Unfair advantage...


> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Uhmm, smart-ass me thought so -- so I bet my party I could beat them to
> Qeynos from SK bridge (they were bitching that Selo's cancelled their
SoW's
> and that is another story.) Out of the starting gate, things looking
good.
> But then my str buff wore off and I became encumbered. I lost in a big
way.
> SoW is way over modeled - we need to petition for changes <g>
>
> Seriously, it will depend also on your weight / agi (if I get encumbered
my
> agi takes a big hit - so don't know if its merely weight or agi or both.)
>
> Sylly
> Bard of the 13th level
> a.k.a. Robo-Bard
> camped out in Halas on Innoruuk
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 02, 1999 3:07 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Unfair advantage...
>
> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> I just noticed the announcement for the High Moon Festival
> on Povar. (for
> those not privy, go to
> http://everquest.station.sony.com/n_news.html#news0702c )
>
> During this Festival, one of the events will be an "Iron
> man" race:
>
> [snips]
>
> Wow!!! But... um.. SoW, huh? Is it just me, or can a Bard
> with a drum
> outrun SoW any day of the week? Not to mention what we're
> hearing about
> this battledrum....
>
> Methinks a Povar Bard will win this competition if he's
> smart ;)
>
> Talies the Wanderer
> Bristlebane
>
>
